experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.summary: Leading frontend architecture and UX implementation for the Lowe's Returns Android application used by sales floor associates.
bullets: Lead the adoption of a micro frontend architecture for the Lowes Returns Android app to improve scalability and developer velocity.
Implement new React, Ionic, and Capacitor user experiences for the Lowes Returns Android app used by sales floor associates.

experiences.title: Front End Engineer
experiences.summary: Developed and supported React-based user experiences for the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) Console at scale.
bullets: Led implementation and launch of new React user experiences on the AWS Identity and Access Management Console, impacting thousands of customers, and monitored and remediated incoming customer issues.
Participated in a monthly on-call rotation for the IAM console, resolving customer and operational issues and presenting weekly status to the broader Identity team.
Wrote extensive unit and integration tests using React Testing Library, Enzyme, and Cypress.
Left role voluntarily to relocate closer to family in Chicago, IL; was not affected by layoffs.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.summary: Contributed front-end features and tests to a Dart and React-based web application (Wdesk).
bullets: Developed front-end features for a Dart and React based web application, Wdesk.
Built an improved modal to manage XBRL profiles in Wdesk.
Collaborated within an Agile team, participating in code review and writing unit and functional tests.

experiences.title: Web Software Developer Intern
experiences.summary: Sole developer for a full-stack discrepancy logger web application for NPR Audio Engineering.
bullets: Developed an Audio Engineering discrepancy logger web application using MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js as the sole developer.
Containerized the application with Docker to support CI/CD workflows.
Used Jira and related tools for project management and tracking.

education.summary: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering.

awards.title: Technical Education Senior Award
awards.summary: Awarded to students who exhibited outstanding work and dedication in the area of Technical Education.

awards.title: WSC Logo Design - 1st Place
awards.summary: Won 1st place prize of $1,000 in a logo design competition hosted by the Wheaton Sport Center in Wheaton, IL.

skills.name: Personal Projects
skills.summary: Full-stack web and native mobile applications leveraging machine learning and AI.
